title: Mystery Gift Rewards
body: I read on your link that we will receive a mystery skin if we bought 6 or more mystery skins from the event, a week after the event ends. It has been a week and I have yet to receive anything.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

You'll receive the rewards within a week of the Burning Tides event ending (August 10th) Hang tight! :]
I received only one, when I should have received 4. I got it after i won a game, it was Angler Jax, but I bought 24 skins using mystery gift. So I am wondering were the other three are.
5 days is a week in what country?
